original_text: At this time, we see things as if we were looking at them in a mirror. What we see now is not clear. But the time will come when we do not need a mirror. We will see everything clearly. Now we know only a part of what is true. But then we will know everything completely. We will understand completely, just as God understands us completely.
korean_text: 우리가 지금은 거울로 보는 것 같이 희미하나 그 때에는 얼굴과 얼굴을 대하여 볼 것이요 지금은 내가 부분적으로 아나 그 때에는 주께서 나를 아신 것 같이 내가 온전히 알리라

sentences.original_text: At this time, we see things
as if we were looking at them in a mirror
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 거울에 비친 것을 보는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: What we see now is not clear
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 우리가 보는 것은 분명하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: when we do not need a mirror

sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모든 것을 분명하게 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Now we know only a part of what is true
But then we will know everything completely
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그때 우리는 모든 것을 완전히 알 것입니다

sentences.original_text: just as God understands us completely
